Title: CodeTextBox
Description: CodeTextBox is a Windows Forms control for colorizing code while you are typing in the text box.
HomeWiki:
CodeTextBox is a Windows Forms control for colorizing code while you are typing in the text box.

I'm a student.  I am devoting my passion and spare time to developing the open-source project.  If you would like to excite me and motivate me, please donate :)
